channel.title: Unesco on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in Unesco on UN-aligned

item.title: Odessa's Cultural Heritage Threatened by Ongoing Conflict in Ukraine
item.author: Adrian Liberto
item.description: Despite being inscribed on UNESCO's World Heritage List, the historical Ukrainian city of Odessa struggles to protect its monuments from the effects of war.

item.title: UNESCOâ€™s 44th Session: 27 sites that made it into the World Heritage List - in Pictures
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: The 44th session of the World Heritage Committee saw Liverpool stripped of its heritage status due to development concerns, while Venice and the Great Barrier Reef narrowly avoided being added to the list of endangered sites.
